QuestData.Title: Kael'thas and the Verdant Sphere
QuestData.Description: The air around you hums - a gentle hum. The naaru are aware of your victory. Perhaps they are the reason you were compelled to pick up this sphere from the still-twitching remains of Kael'thas Sunstrider. What secrets could it hold?$B$BPerhaps A'dal in Shattrath City could make sense of the item.
QuestData.LogDescription: Take the Verdant Sphere to A'dal in Shattrath City.
QuestData.RewardText: <A'dal's thoughts intermingle with your own.>$B$BThe sphere... Strange. Did you know that he lived? Yes. It is here - in the sphere itself. Maimed for certain. He calls to a higher power now. No, not Illidan.$B$BHigher.$B$BKil'jaeden the Deceiver comes...$B$BNot here...$B$B<A'dal points your mind elsewhere.>$B$BAzeroth. Unknown.$B$BRest. Your brothers and sisters will retake Tempest Keep now.$B$B<A'dal hums a song of battle.>
